name: Long Live The King (Lideiras)
description:
The King has killed all your loved ones, now it's time for you to take revenge on him, infiltrate into his castle and complete the objectives, so you can access his protected room and kill him in this Thief like inspired game where you will have to use your stealth abilities like hide into closets if you are being chased and your aim with bow and arrow, so you can break through all the kings defenses and finally get the revenge you always wanted.

You will be armed with a bow and some arrows but also a knife which can be used in close combat if necessary, the goal is to complete all the objectives, so you get the option to infiltrate into the king's room, and you will be able to kill him.

But first you will need to escape from the prison he put you in after your first assassination try, so you will need to find a way out of that shithole and retrieve all your belongings needed to accomplish your objective to do this you will also count with the main character's special ability which can allow her to watch through walls to locate enemies.
